SEARCH
Package Add_card

Class Bank

java.lang.Object
Add_card.Bank
public class Bank extends Object
Represents a bank entity with a name and a unique bank ID. Also manages a static list of valid supported banks.

  • Method Details

    • setSuppBanks

      public static void setSuppBanks()
      Initializes and populates the list of supported banks. This method should be called once during application startup.

    • getBankByName

      public static Bank getBankByName(String name)
      Retrieves a Bank object based on its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the bank (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      the matching Bank object if found, or null otherwise

    • getBanks

      public static void getBanks()
      Prints the names of all supported banks to the console.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the bank.
      Returns:
      the name of the bank

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the bank.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to set for the bank

    • getBankId

      public String getBankId()
      Returns the unique ID of the bank.
      Returns:
      the bank's ID

    • setBankId

      public void setBankId(String bankId)
      Sets the unique ID of the bank.
      Parameters:
      bankId - the ID to set for the bank

    • getValidBanks

      public Map<String,Bank> getValidBanks()
      Returns the map of valid supported banks.
      Returns:
      the map of bank names to Bank objects
